---
title: 'calculateConversionAmount'
openapi: 'openapi-calculateConversionAmount POST /'
description: 'Returns the amount of Quai in Wei or Qi in Qits left after converting an amount of Qi in Qits to Quai in Wei at the current block exchange rate and after applying the appropriate slip.'
